about_us: Experience Dolby Atmos with select sony headphones and Bravia XR TV2
Lower lag time then a traditional Bluetooth connection1

All features: This image is using WH-1000XM4. The same experience is available with selected Sony headphones.
360 Spatial Sound that adapts to your ea: With BRAVIA XR™ and Selected Sony Headphones Tailor your Dolby Atmos® experience with BRAVIA XR™ and selected Sony headphones and enjoy 360 Spatial Sound. The WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter works with our headphones to create atmospheric personal cinema that surrounds you for a whole new way of listening.1
A personal cinematic experience, just fo: With the Sony | 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app2, you’ll enjoy a sound experience that’s optimized for you. The app captures and analyses your ear shape, then creates your own personal spatial sound field when paired with BRAVIA XR TVs and selected Sony headphones.1
Connect: Connect the WLA-NS7 wireless transmitter to your BRAVIA XR TV with an optical cable and USB cable.
Pair: Pair your Sony headphones with the wireless transmitter over a Bluetooth® connection.2
Personalize: Capture your ear shape using the Sony | 360 Spatial Sound Personalizer app2 and enjoy a personalized sound experience.1
